name: Full Stack Developer Intern
point1: Designed and developed responsive websites by seamlessly translating Figma designs into live web applications using Next.js
point2: Collaborated effectively with the design team to ensure pixel-perfect implementations and a cohesive user experience.
point3: Spearheaded the development of a company product, ”Six Thinking Hats,” a React Native application designed to streamline decision-making processes for startups.
point4: Implemented a new feature for Google Maps that allows users to see the most popular times for a place

name: Artificial Intelligence Intern
point1: Acquired valuable hands-on experience in machine learning and artificial intelligence by actively participating in the IBM SkillsBuild platform.
point2: Demonstrated technical proficiency by designing and implementing a Mental Fitness Tracker using Python.
point3: This innovative tool accurately predicts user mental fitness levels, leveraging various factors for assessment.
